"<div class=hanzi>的</div>
<span style=""font-family:SimSun; font-size: 22px; color: #B80000; ""></span>
<div class=pinyin><br></div>
<div class=english><br></div>
<div class=description><br></div>
<hr>
<div class=sentence>我是他<b>的</b>朋友。</div>
"	"<div class=hanzi>的</div>
<span style=""font-family:SimSun; font-size: 22px; color: #B80000; ""></span>
<div class=pinyin>de</div>
<div class=english>indicates possession, like adding 's to a noun</div>
<div class=description>auxiliary</div>
<hr>
<div class=sentence>我是他<b>的</b>朋友。</div>
<div class=pinyinSen>Wǒ shì tā de péngyou.</div>
<div class=meaningSent>I'm a friend of his.</div>

<div class=pinyinSen>Suīrán pǎo de hěn lèi, dànshì hěn duō rén dōu méiyǒu fàngqì.</div>
<div class=meaningSent>Though exhausted from running, many refused to give up.</div>

<span style=""font-family:SimSun; font-size: 22px; color: #B80000; ""></span>
<div class=pinyin><br></div>
<div class=english><br></div>
<div class=description><br></div>
<hr>
<div class=sentence><b>如果</b>我是超人就好了。</div>
"	"<div class=hanzi>如果</div>
<span style=""font-family:SimSun; font-size: 22px; color: #B80000; ""></span>
<div class=pinyin>rúguǒ</div>
<div class=english>if; in the event that</div>
<div class=description>conjunction</div>
<hr>
<div class=sentence><b>如果</b>我是超人就好了。</div>
<div class=pinyinSen>Rúguǒ wǒ shì chāorén jiù hǎo le.</div>
<div class=meaningSent>It would be great if I were superhuman.</div>

<div class=description>noun</div>
<hr>

<span style=""font-family:SimSun; font-size: 22px; color: #B80000; ""></span>
<div class=pinyin>pèihé</div>
<div class=english>be harmoniously combined or arranged; matching; fitting in with; compatible with; to correspond; to fit; to conform to; rapport; to coordinate with; to act in concern with; to cooperate; to become man and wife; to combine parts of a machine</div>

<div class=pinyinSen>Xīnchūn dì yī tiān, dàjiā yī jiànmiàn jiù hùxiàng bàinián.</div>
<div class=meaningSent>People greet each other on the first day of Chinese New Year.</div>
